content.title: We continue the line of relevant materials about vegetables and fruits, which are now in abundance on the shelves. Our main character today is a melon . Who is not allowed to eat melon, see our article.

content.text: Earlier, we wrote about someone who is not allowed to eat watermelon , peaches and plums . The turn has come and fragrant melon. In the summer, it is very difficult to find a person who would not like melon. This fruit can be both an independent dish and a dessert.
We can talk endlessly about the beneficial properties of melon.

content.perechen: it is a storehouse of vitamins;
melon perfectly improves the functioning of the heart and nervous system;
it helps with problems of blood formation, since there is a lot of iron in the melon;
this melon culture is ideal for those  who have disorders in the functioning of the liver and kidneys;
melon enters the fight against viruses and bacteria and generally improves immunity;
has a positive effect on the digestive tract, as it contains a lot of coarse fibers.

content.text: But still, even with such colossal benefits, there are contraindications.
You cannot eat a melon if:

content.perechen: you are a nursing mother or in a position;
you suffer from inflammatory and infectious diseases of the stomach and intestines
